title: 'Inherited a mess, fixing it': Donald Trump hits out at Biden — top quotes from White House speech
content: President Trump highlighted significant achievements in foreign policy, economy, and border security during his address. He claimed to have resolved numerous international conflicts, boosted the US economy through tariffs and investment, and strengthened border control. Trump asserted his administration's focus on law-abiding citizens over perceived special interests.

title: Flying spy? Seagull with made-in-China GPS tracker found on Karnataka beach
content: A GPS-tagged seagull on Karwar beach, initially causing local concern, was revealed to be part of a scientific study by the Wildlife and Nature Protection Society of Sri Lanka. Forest officials confirmed the device was for tracking migration patterns, not surveillance, after the exhausted bird was rescued.

title: Delhi smog tightens grip: AQI stays ‘very poor’ at 370; visibility dips
content: Delhi is battling severe smog, with air quality reaching 'very poor' levels. Authorities have activated all Stage-IV measures under the Graded Response Action Plan across Delhi-NCR to combat the escalating pollution. Inspections revealed significant dust and waste accumulation on roads, highlighting the urgent need for improved maintenance and dust-control efforts.

title: Drugs, parties, penalties: B'luru apartment body booked for running parallel justice system
content: Police in Bengaluru have launched a criminal probe into an apartment association and a security firm. They allegedly ran an illegal system, imposing penalties for drug possession and late-night parties. This system suppressed serious crimes, denying justice to victims. The association collected over Rs 3.3 lakh in fines. Police are investigating the deliberate cover-up of offenses.

title: 260 cases! India is world's worst dope offender: Tops list for third straight time
content: India has once again topped the global list for dope violations, with 260 athletes flagged in 2024, according to a WADA report. This marks the third consecutive year the nation leads in doping offenses. Despite intensified testing, the high figures raise concerns as India prepares to host major sporting events.

title: After Mark Zuckerberg, Altman eyes Nvidia alternatives; Amazon may supply OpenAI chips
content: Amazon is reportedly in talks to invest over $10 billion in OpenAI, potentially using Amazon's Trainium chips. This move could challenge Nvidia's AI chip dominance, as tech giants like Meta also explore alternatives. OpenAI has been actively securing infrastructure deals, including a recent $38 billion agreement with AWS.

title: Caught on camera! 'Angry' Bumrah snatches phone after fan ignores warning - Watch
content: Indian pacer Jasprit Bumrah was seen losing his temper at an airport, snatching a fan's phone who was recording him without permission. After a brief exchange, Bumrah returned the device. The cricketer is currently part of India's T20I series against South Africa, with India leading 2-1.

title: Meet Amandeep Singh Bola; PIO who ran towards Bondi bullets, pounced on shooter
content: A Punjabi-Sikh New Zealander, Amandeep Singh Bola, displayed remarkable bravery during the Bondi beach shooting. While enjoying a kebab, he heard gunshots and instinctively ran towards the danger. Bola tackled one of the gunmen, disarmed him, and held him down until police arrived, embodying the spirit of multiculturalism amidst chaos.

title: AI race alert: Google beating OpenAI could cripple its API business; ex-researcher warns
content: OpenAI's CEO Sam Altman declared a 'Code Red' following Google's Gemini 3.0 launch, urging a focus on ChatGPT's improvement. A former researcher warned Google's advancements could cripple OpenAI's API and subscription services. Google's 'full-stack' advantage, from custom chips to product integration, fuels its competitive edge, with Gemini reportedly surpassing GPT-5 on benchmarks.

title: Top stocks to buy: Stock recommendations for today - check list
content: Top stock market recommendations: Aakash K Hindocha, has identified ZF Commercial Vehicle Control Systems India, Glenmark Pharmaceuticals, and BPCL as top stock recommendations. He also provided an optimistic outlook for Nifty and Bank Nifty, anticipating further gains for both indices.

title: Dhurandhar breaks Box Office records: Film tops Rs 500 crore in India; eyes Rs 1000 crore club
content: Ranveer Singh and Akshaye Khanna's spy thriller 'Dhurandhar' is making waves, nearing Rs 250 crore in its second week and surpassing Rs 500 crore in India gross collections. The film has become Ranveer Singh's highest-grossing movie globally, outperforming 'Padmaavat' and is now set to enter the Rs 1000 crore club.

title: IPL Auction: 'They missed a trick' - R Ashwin questions CSK’s strategy
content: Ravichandran Ashwin believes Chennai Super Kings missed a significant opportunity by not securing Cameron Green at the IPL 2026 mini-auction.  He suggests Kolkata Knight Riders could have employed a more patient bidding strategy to force CSK's hand earlier. Ashwin lauded Green as a generational talent, calling his acquisition by KKR brilliant.

title: Amazon layoffs: Biggest ever job cuts in Europe; these roles are impacted the most
content: Amazon is cutting 370 jobs, or 8.5% of its Luxembourg workforce, impacting software developers as the company embraces AI. This reduction follows a global layoff of 14,000 employees and comes after negotiations resulted in a reduced number from the initial plan. Despite the cuts, Amazon reaffirms Luxembourg as a strategic European partner.

title: ‘This is how we did it’: China embassy has advice for Delhi pollution- what it said
content: China's Beijing has significantly improved its air quality by implementing stringent vehicle emission controls, phasing out old vehicles, and promoting electric mobility. The nation also undertook industrial restructuring, relocating heavy industries and transforming former factory sites. These comprehensive, large-scale, and urgent measures offer valuable lessons for India's approach to tackling air pollution.

title: Chiefs star Patrick Mahomes’ injury eerily foretold by preseason commercial
content: Kansas City Chiefs' star quarterback Patrick Mahomes suffered a season-ending knee injury, missing the playoffs for the first time in his career. Following successful surgery for ACL and LCL tears, he faces an 8-9 month rehabilitation, targeting a return at the start of the 2026 season. His determination and the support of trainers offer hope for a strong comeback.

title: Shohei Ohtani and Mamiko Tanaka net worth 2025: Dodgers star’s earnings
content: Shohei Ohtani's net worth is estimated at $150 million in 2025, primarily from endorsements due to his heavily deferred Dodgers contract. His wife, Mamiko Tanaka, a former basketball player, is estimated to be worth around $70 million. Together, their combined wealth is believed to exceed $220 million, built independently through their respective athletic careers.

title: Bondi Beach shooting: Terror suspect Sajid was refused Aus citizenship many times; what we know
content: Sydney terror accused Sajid Akram, who failed to secure Australian citizenship, last renewed his Indian passport in 2022. His son Naveed was cleared by ASIO in 2019. Telangana police found their Hyderabad visits were personal, with no extremist links or visits to Pakistan. Sajid moved to Australia in 1998.

title: Silent Hill Townfall: release date, story, gameplay, platforms & key details
content: Silent Hill Townfall, a highly anticipated collaboration, may be closer than expected. A recent retail listing suggests a March 26, 2026 release, fueling speculation about a new Silent Hill Transmission.  While details remain scarce, the game promises deep psychological horror, aligning with the studio's past work and the franchise's resurgence.

title: 'Love trap': Woman held for harassing B'luru cop; used minister pics to threaten his career
content: A Bengaluru police inspector thwarted a "love trap" orchestrated by a woman who bombarded him with calls and messages, escalating to threats of suicide and political influence.  Her persistent advances, including gifts and love letters, were met with refusal, leading to her arrest.  Investigations revealed similar past incidents involving alleged extortion.

title: How police secretly tracked missing coach Travis Turner before abuse charges
content: Experts believe fugitive football coach Travis Turner was likely caught through a secret police sting or flagged online activity. Authorities say Turner faces 10 child pornography-related charges. While police remain silent, criminologists told the Daily Mail that undercover officers, tech company reports, or device searches likely led to the case.

title: Braun Strowman & Raquel Rodriguez net worth 2025: WWE earnings
content: Braun Strowman and Raquel Rodriguez showcase contrasting WWE financial journeys in 2025. Strowman, a former headliner, boasts an estimated net worth of $2-5 million, built on lucrative deals and merchandise. Rodriguez, a rising star, has a projected $700,000, with her value steadily increasing through television exposure and championship opportunities.

title: Gisele Bündchen spotted jet skiing in Florida with Joaquim Valente amid Tom Brady buzz
content: Gisele Bündchen and Joaquim Valente embraced a sun-drenched holiday with a jet ski outing near their Florida home, prioritizing family and privacy after welcoming their son. This choice reflects Bündchen's current focus on grounding moments and personal strength over public spectacle. Meanwhile, Tom Brady confirmed his NFL retirement is permanent due to his ownership stake in the Raiders.

title: Stephen & Ayesha Curry net worth 2025: Earnings, assets and investments
content: NBA star Stephen Curry and his wife Ayesha, a successful chef and entrepreneur, boast a combined net worth nearing $290 million by late 2025. Stephen's wealth, estimated at $240 million, stems from lucrative NBA contracts and endorsements. Ayesha contributes around $50 million through her media ventures and businesses, showcasing their impressive financial success.

title: Terence Crawford Net Worth 2025: Unbeaten boxer’s earnings and investments
content: Unbeaten boxing sensation Terence Crawford has retired at the age of 38, declaring he has nothing left to prove after a stellar career.  His perfect record includes dominating multiple weight classes and defeating top names.  Crawford's impressive earnings are estimated at over $60 million from fights alone, along with his endorsements and investments.

title: Starting 2029, Oscars will stream on YouTube. Here’s why
content: Starting in 2029, the iconic Academy Awards will leave behind conventional television in favor of YouTube, signaling a monumental shift from decades spent on ABC. This innovative multi-year partnership aims to engage a worldwide, digitally-centric audience, acknowledging the evolution of viewing preferences.

title: Dense fog: Air India issues travel advisory; warns of possible flight disruptions
content: Air India has issued a travel advisory warning passengers of possible flight disruptions over the next few days. Dense fog conditions are expected in northern and eastern India, particularly affecting Delhi. Passengers are advised to check flight statuses before traveling. The airline has launched 'FogCare' to offer advance alerts and options to reschedule or get refunds for affected flights.

title: Celeste Desjardins shares sweet message as Leon Draisaitl reaches 1000 NHL points
content: Leon Draisaitl etched his name in history, becoming the first German-born NHL player to reach 1,000 career points. The milestone occurred during a power play, with Draisaitl assisting Connor McDavid, who then set up Zach Hyman for the goal against former teammate Stuart Skinner. His wife, Celeste Desjardins, celebrated with a heartfelt message, calling him 'AMAZING' and 'incredibly proud'.

title: 4th T20I: No toss, no play! Fog kills India vs South Africa clash in Lucknow
content: Dense fog and smog led to the abandonment of the fourth T20 International between India and South Africa in Lucknow without a ball being bowled. Umpires conducted multiple inspections throughout the evening, ultimately deeming conditions unsafe for play due to poor visibility. India maintains a 2-1 series lead heading into the final match.

title: Wang Kun cause of death: Chinese bodybuilding champion dies suddenly at 30
content: Chinese bodybuilding champion Wang Kun, aged 30, has passed away unexpectedly, reportedly due to a heart issue. Renowned for his disciplined, monk-like lifestyle focused on clean eating and rigorous training, Wang's sudden demise has sent shockwaves through the fitness community. His eight consecutive national titles and inspiring dedication made him a prominent figure, leaving a significant void in the sport.

title: Dwyane Wade & Gabrielle Union Wade Net Worth 2025: Earnings and assets
content: NBA legend Dwyane Wade and wife Gabrielle Union boast a combined net worth of $210 million as of February 2025. Wade's substantial earnings stem from his 16-year NBA career, while Union's fortune is built on successful acting roles. The power couple also benefits from lucrative endorsement deals and owns impressive real estate holdings.

title: Nightclub fire case: Police bring Luthras to Goa, court sends them to 5-day police custody
content: Owners of Birch by Romeo Lane, where 25 died in a fire, were remanded in five-day police custody. Goa police sought custody to uncover financial transactions, prevent further illegal operations, and identify associates. The Luthra brothers had fled India after the incident but were arrested upon their return.

title: Quote of the day by Sylvester Stallone: 'I believe any success in life…'
content: Hollywood icon Sylvester Stallone's journey from struggle to stardom, exemplified by his self-penned 'Rocky,' underscores a philosophy of 'blind, furious optimism.' This quote, widely attributed to him, champions fearless belief and relentless effort in pursuing goals, even amidst uncertainty.

title: Still afloat, still fragile: How Pakistan economy is dodging a complete collapse — explained
content: Pakistan's economy survives through repeated IMF bailouts, tactical monetary policy, and selective foreign investment, particularly from China. Despite signs of financial market confidence and tentative re-engagement with the US, deep structural issues like 'state capture' and elite privilege persist, hindering sustainable prosperity and leaving the nation in a cycle of crisis.

title: Ethan McLeod cause of death: How Macclesfield FC forward died at 21
content: Young footballer Ethan McLeod tragically died at 21 in a car crash. He was returning home from his team Macclesfield F.C.'s match. McLeod was a talented player with an infectious personality. His loss has deeply shocked his club and the wider football community. A minute of silence will be held before the next game to honor his memory.

title: Bears expand stadium search to include Indiana
content: The Chicago Bears are exploring locations for a new stadium outside the city and even outside Illinois after multiple plans hit stumbling blocks over concerns about the cost to taxpayers.

title: Michigan to 'act swiftly' if findings warrant firings
content: Michigan's investigation into its football program and athletic department could lead to findings of additional misconduct that might trigger more terminations, interim president Domenico Grasso said Wednesday.

title: NCAA slams Kalshi's intent to offer portal trading
content: Prediction market Kalshi filed notice to the Commodity Futures Trading Commission on Wednesday that it intends to offer trading on the transfer portal, prompting the NCAA to say it "vehemently opposes college sports prediction markets."

title: Ohio fires coach Smith over 'serious' misconduct
content: Ohio University has fired football coach Brian Smith for cause, saying he violated his contract by "engaging in serious professional misconduct and participating in activities that reflect unfavorably on the University."

title: Nacua: Refs 'the worst,' make calls to get on TV
content: The Rams' Puka Nacua said on a livestream Tuesday night that he thinks some NFL referees make calls just to get shown on TV during games.

title: Burrow on Bengals future: 'Crazy things happen'
content: Bengals quarterback Joe Burrow was asked Wednesday if he ever envisioned playing for another franchise.

title: Sources: FSG to sell Penguins to Hoffmann family
content: Fenway Sports Group has agreed in principle to sell the Pittsburgh Penguins to the Chicago-based Hoffmann family, sources confirmed to ESPN.

content: Will Dolphins part ways with Tagovailoa or his contract prohibitive? Did Mike McDaniel fail with Tagovailoa?

title: Bracketology: Five contenders -- and everyone else
content: UConn, Texas, South Carolina and UCLA remain 1-seeds -- and LSU is the only real challenger behind them.

content: North Carolina's Caleb Wilson rounds out a solid top three while three new names crack the latest edition.

title: English soccer's drinking culture has faded from the Rooney era to now, but it's not gone
content: Wayne Rooney's honesty about his battle with alcohol during his prime has brought English soccer's issues back to the forefront. The one positive might be how clubs are investing in resources and care to help.

content: Amen Thompson and Alperen Sengun spent the offseason 6,000 miles apart as they worked to reach a new level this season.

title: Geek and destroy: How Bruins winger Morgan Geekie has defied goal-scoring regression
content: Many expected the 27-year-old to take a step back from his 33 goals last season. Instead, he's on pace for 58.

content: Here's the latest, including intel on Patrick Mahomes, Micah Parsons, Philip Rivers, playoff races and offseason trade candidates.

title: How NFL teams complain to the league about officiating calls
content: John Harbaugh grumbling about an overturned TD is an example of why the NFL pays attention to complaints.

title: If Chelsea finally win Champions League, Bronze's brilliance will carry them
content: Defying reason and self-preservation, Chelsea's Lucy Bronze continues to shine in the biggest moments.

title: A reason (or two) to watch every one of this year's bowl games
content: With first-year success stories, chances at redemption and general silliness, bowl season always delivers.

title: The anti-anhedonic Aggies: Can Mike Elko and this Texas A&M team make all the talk about the past stop?
content: The Aggies head into their first College Football Playoff appearance looking to banish the program's ghosts.

title: Can the NBA Cup's surprise finalists make a Finals run? Why there's already a road map
content: ESPN analyst Kevin Pelton breaks down how the finalist Spurs and semifinalist Magic can use their cup experience for the postseason.

title: Why the Clippers sent a franchise legend home
content: A future Hall of Famer at the end of his career, looking for one final ride. And a flailing team at the end of a largely failed era. Here's why the Chris Paul-Clippers reunion was doomed -- nearly from the start.

title: Facts vs. Feelings: Bo Nix and six other potential playoff heroes
content: We don't get to know the script before the game's played, but the facts portend who has a chance to play hero.

content: Matt Bowen gives an overview of what to expect from the Dolphins' top players with a new QB under center.

title: Don't doubt Terence Crawford, even in his retirement from boxing
content: After proving everyone wrong in defeating Canelo Alvarez, Crawford can walk away on his own terms -- for good.

title: Projecting Golden Boy, Girl 2026: Estêvão, Yohannes to succeed Doué, Agyemang?
content: PSG's Désiré Doué and Arsenal's Michelle Agyemang won the 2025 Golden Boy and Girl awards for the best player under the age of 21, but who could win it next year?

title: What is the world record for the longest penalty shootout in soccer history?
content: The 2025 Apertura final had the longest shootout in Liga MX history. But the world record? Not even close.

title: The 'what ifs' that could've won Verstappen, Piastri the F1 title
content: Buying into counterfactuals is unwise but entertaining, and these "what if" moments could well have won Max Verstappen or Oscar Piastri the F1 title.

title: NBA Futures: Thunder remain championship favorites; Knicks' title odds unchanged
content: The Oklahoma City Thunder are still big favorites to repeat as champions, while Shai Gilgeous-Alexander has moved back in front in the MVP race.

content: It's a tight race at the top of the 2026 draft. We talked to insiders to learn where things stand now.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Barcelona pursue Inter Milan defender Bastoni
content: Barcelona have made an enquiry regarding Inter Milan center back Alessandro Bastoni. Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.

title: PNB scam: Belgium top court endorses lower court view; no risk of denial of justice to Choksi in India
content: India has given a number of assurances to Belgium regarding Choksi's safety, the charges that he would face during trial in India, prison arrangements, human rights and medical needs

title: Congress protests in Chhattisgarh against ‘misuse of investigating agencies’
content: Congress party staged protests outside the BJP office following the court’s dismissal of the ED’s charge sheet in the National Herald case.

title: Delhi HC questions government over failure to regulate sale of old vehicles
content: A Bench of Chief Justice Devendra Kumar Upadhyaya and Justice Tushar Rao Gedela asked the Delhi government to file a detailed response on the issue of regulating authorised dealers of registered vehicles

title: Indians ‘cut off’ from internet in flights, Maran complains; Telecom Minister says norms in works
content: DMK MP Dayanidhi Maran complained of India being one of the few places globally “cut off” from in-flight WiFi; communications Minister Jyotiraditya Scindia said that norms in this regard were being worked out

title: Webinar on Career Compass on December 21
content: The webinar will seek to offer clarity on career pathways beyond academics for students across disciplines, with a focus on real-world readiness, innovation, and adaptability to evolving landscapes

title: Two emerge as strong contenders for N. Paravur municipal chairperson post
content: The main criteria for consideration for all posts are seniority and long-term affiliation with the United Democratic Front

title: Farmers give 20-day ultimatum for closure of ethanol plant in Hanumangarh
content: Farmers in the region fear that the factory would create a livelihood crisis by making the agricultural land barren through groundwater contamination and air pollution.

title: Return votes first: male beneficiaries of Bihar scheme for women
content: The Bihar Rural Livelihoods Promotion Society, an autonomous body under the Department of Rural Development better known as JEEViKA, had sent notices to the male recipients asking them to return the amount after the mistake came to light

title: Bombay HC allows Gautam Navlakha to relocate to Delhi, sets strict conditions
content: The court, however, directed that he must attend proceedings before the special NIA court in Mumbai whenever required.

title: Despite conflicts, we used the bureaucracy’s experience to implement policies: Shailaja
content: At the launch of the Tamil translation of her book, the former Kerala Health Minister spoke of her association with then Health Secretary and their work to implement the e-Health Project in Kerala

title: Anbumani questions DMK’s failure to conduct caste survey
content: Speaking at a protest, he said the caste-wise survey was essential to protect the 69% reservations in place in Tamil Nadu, ensure proper delivery of government schemes

title: Two more Indians killed in Russia-Ukraine war zone, bodies arrive at Delhi airport
content: The deceased, Ajay Godara and Rakesh Kumar, had gone to Russia on student visa but were allegedly enlisted in the Russian Army after being misled by agents who promised them work as cleaners and helpers

title: Provide proper facilities for the disabled and aged voters at Tamil Nadu, Puducherry polling stations: HC
content: Chief Justice Manindra Mohan Shrivastava and Justice G. Arul Murugan insist on implementing Election Commission of India’s 2023 instructions in letter and spirit

title: Thirupparankundram row: Law and order can’t be cited to flout court orders, says Justice G.R. Swaminathan
content: The HC judge was hearing two contempt of court cases, including one related to the Thirupparankundram deepam row

title: State allocated ₹113.10 crore for menstrual hygiene programme in 2024-25, A-G tells Madras High Court
content: Chief Justice’s Bench calls for additional details to find out if the programme could be expanded to include women in BPL and economic weaker section categories

title: Delhi air pollution: SC points to winter school break while hearing a plea to open primary classes, mid-day meal
content: The senior counsel said for the poor, who could not afford air-purifiers, staying at home, away from school, deprives them of education, a mid-day meal and no safety from pollution; for them, the intensity of pollution at home may be worse than in school.

title: Delhi HC cracks down on alleged use of pirated surveillance software at Udyog Bhawan
content: It was found that multiple unauthorised copies of the Mirasys software, originally licensed for another site in Gurugram, were illegally copied and surreptitiously installed at the premises of Udyog Bhawan, New Delhi

title: Case registered against IUML workers for alleged caste slur
content: The alleged incident took place on December 13, soon after the announcement of the local body election results

title: Watch: Delhi govt planning overhaul of PUC certificate issuing system: Environment Minister
content: Delhi government is considering an overhaul of the Pollution Under Control (PUC) certificate issuing system as the existing centres are old with many shortcomings Environment Minister Manjinder Singh Sirsa said on December 17, amid the ongoing pollution crisis in the national capital.

title: Psychological distress linked to problematic pornography use, says NIMHANS study
content: Problematic pornography use among Indian adults is closely associated with psychological distress, with anxiety and stress emerging as key predictors, according to a recent study by researchers from NIMHANS

title: Madhya Pradesh revokes Ujjain land pooling scheme amid farmers’ protest call
content: Town development plan for Simhastha Kumbh infrastructure withdrawn after opposition from farmer bodies

title: Bill to replace MGNREGA faces criticism; TDP flags increased burden on State
content: Lok Sabha begins discussion on the Bill; NDA allies support the Bill, though TDP pointed out that a fund-starved State like Andhra Pradesh will need additional support

title: BJP slams Chavan’s remarks on Operation Sindoor, demands apology from Congress
content: The BJP said that the Congress was attempting to humiliate India and the Army on international platforms under pressure

title: Watch: Parliament clears Bill to allow 100% FDI in insurance sector
content: During the debate in Rajya Sabha, the Opposition demanded the Bill should be sent to a select committee of Parliament given the far-reaching impact it has on the insurance sector

title: Convicted Maharashtra Minister Manikrao Kokate loses all portfolios, to appeal
content: Sessions Court upholds his 2-year sentence in 1995 housing scam case; Ajit Pawar given charge of Sports, Youth Welfare, Minorities, Aukaf

title: Lok Sabha passes nuclear energy Bill allowing privatisation
content: Congress protests SHANTI Bill which removes clause holding equipment supplier responsible for failure, questions its timing and interest shown by a ‘conglomerate house’; Centre defends the Bill

title: Conduct inquiry into Operation Sindoor, Pahalgam attacks, demands former Maharashtra CM Prithviraj Chavan
content: ‘It is my duty as a citizen to develop the scientific temper, humanism, and the spirit of inquiry and reform, promoting rational thinking, compassion, and progress, rather than blind faith or superstition,’ the Congress leader said, defending his earlier remarks

title: Panel formed to probe HIV infection case in Madhya Pradesh
content: Committee to submit report in seven days on alleged contaminated blood transfusions in Satna that resulted in six children getting infected HIV

title: Kavach installed on 2,000 km of rail network; rollout moving very fast, Vaishnaw tells Lok Sabha
content: The Minister said the Railways has so far laid 7,129 km of OFC, installed 860 telecom towers, connected 767 stations to data centres, deployed trackside equipment along 3,413 km, and equipped 4,154 locomotives with the system

title: Caught in a Limbo: Delays plague R.R. Nagar flyover and underpass projects, commuters bear the brunt
content: Much like last year, two crucial projects aimed at decongesting West Bengaluru’s R.R. Nagar have not moved an inch, while one long-neglected project has finally been revived

title: Mid year assessment: GST rate rationalisation to further hit revenues
content: The State estimates the revenue shortfall of ₹9,000 crore in addition to the revenue loss of about ₹9,500 crore due to non -merger of cess

title: Gita Gopinath backs simultaneous polls, flags logistical challenges
content: Synchronised polls could reduce policy uncertainty, spur economic activity, prioritise capital spending, says Ms. Gopinath; however, net cost impact remains uncertain, she tells Parliamentary panel

title: 8 officials, 3 juveniles held over death at Odisha school hostel
content: Authorities at KISS are accused of suppressing the murder by misleading the victim’s parents into believing the death was caused by cardiac arrest

title: President Droupadi Murmu arrives in Hyderabad for winter sojourn
content: During her stay, the President is scheduled to attend various official programmes on December 19 and 20

title: Pilot bodies complain to House panel on ‘corruption’ in DGCA, Ministry
content: The meeting was held to discuss the operational meltdown at IndiGo since early December, which led to the cancellation of over 5,000 flights, affecting at least 12.5 lakh passengers

title: Muslim-dominated segments mapped better in Bengal SIR: study
content: Twenty Assembly constituencies with the highest share of unmapped voters have lower Muslim population; researchers say that the Matua population, Hindu refugees from Bangladesh, could be hit hard by the SIR

title: Uttarakhand Governor returns UCC and religious conversion amendment Bills
content: Governor Gurmit Singh flags technical and drafting issues in key legislations passed by Pushkar Singh Dhami-led government

title: NIA arrests ‘linchpin’ in illegal arms trafficking case
content: Ammunition was illegally procured from ‘gun houses’ in Haryana and other places, smuggled to Uttar Pradesh, and further delivered to Bihar and other parts of the country, the NIA said

title: NMC to add prescription writing in MBBS syllabus
content: The National Medical Commission says the directive is based on the orders of Punjab and Haryana High Court issued on August 27

title: Watch: Bangladesh’s threats to cut NE off cannot be tolerated | Assam CM
content: Himanta Biswa Sarma reacted to a Bangladeshi youth leader’s call to shelter Indian separatists and sever the region from India’s mainland

title: Prasar Bharati drafts policy to monetise television, OTT content
content: The draft Content Syndication Policy, 2025, available for public consulation, seeks to expand the reach of Prasar Bharati’s content, and strengthen India’s cultural presence globally

title: Coalition government encouraging sportspersons: SAAP
content: Nearly 421 sportspersons in the State were given jobs in the recently conducted Mega DSC, says of Sports Authority of Andhra Pradesh

title: Parliament clears Bill to allow 100% FDI in insurance sector
content: During the debate in Rajya Sabha, the Opposition demanded the Bill should be sent to a select committee of Parliament given the far-reaching impact it has on the insurance sector

title: Tourism a top priority sector, says Andhra Pradesh Chief Minister Chandrababu Naidu
content: Its potential is largely untapped, says the Chief Minister; Deputy Chief Minister Pawan Kalyan calls for improving road connectivity to the tribal hamlets as it is a must for development

title: Bevco invites tenders to set up automated bottle collection machines at outlets
content: State government had earlier accorded sanction to charge ₹20 per bottle of liquor and to refund ₹20 to the customers on return of empty bottle

title: Navy commissions second MH-60R copter squadron, the ‘Ospreys’, at INS Hansa
content: With the induction of the versatile, multi-role MH-60R helicopter on the western seaboard as the first operational squadron, the Navy has significantly enhanced its rotary wing combat and surveillance capabilities

title: Trump about to wage war on Venezuela? Tucker Carlson's bold claim ahead of US president’s address

title: Terror suspect sighting in J&K: Searches launched in Samba, Udhampur; security on high alert
content: villagers allegedly spotted three unidentified men with backpacks moving suspiciously in a village in Samba district and alerted police . a team of cops rushed to the village to assess the situation, following which the area was cordoned off for combing by a joint team of security personnel .

title: Delhi-NCR pollution: SC limits old vehicle reprieve; only BS4, BS6 exempt
content: the order will apply only to BS 4 or BS 6 emission norm-compliant vehicles . this order will impact over 14.7 lakh BS 1 compliant cars, three-wheelers, two-wheeler, buses and goods carriers . a bench of cJI Surya Kant and Justices Joymalya Bagchi and Vipul M Pancholi passed the order on an application by Commission for air quality management (CAQM)

title: Donald Trump Reiterates '8 Wars In 10 Months' Claim, Credits 'Tariffs'
content: US President Donald Trump doubled down on his claim that he helped settle at least eight wars across the world in the first 10 months of his second term in the White House.

title: Belgium Court Rejects Mehul Choksi's Appeal Against Extradition
content: The highest court of Belgium has rejected the appeal of fugitive diamantaire Mehul Choksi against India's extradition request, while endorsing a lower court's view that there are no grounds for his claims of flagrant denial of justice.

title: Trump Says Sending $1776 To Every US Soldier As "Warrior Dividend"
content: US President Donald Trump has announced a special cash payout for American troops, calling it a "warrior dividend" to recognise the service and sacrifice of the armed forces.

title: "Zero Illegal Aliens Allowed In US In Last 7 Months": Trump's Top Quotes
content: United States President Donald Trump on Thursday set out plans to make the country "stronger than ever." In a televised address to the nation, Trump strongly criticised the Biden administration.

title: Anupama Gulati Murder Case: Court Upholds Life Term Of Man For Killing Wife
content: The Uttarakhand High Court has upheld the life sentence awarded by the lower court in the Anupama Gulati murder case of Dehradun.

title: Inspired By 'Special 26', Man Fakes IT Raid, Steals 1 Kg Gold, Arrested
content: A 49-year-old man was arrested for allegedly robbing a jewellery workshop in central Delhi's Karol Bagh by posing as a member of an Income Tax raid team after being inspired by the Bollywood movie 'Special 26', police said on Wednesday.

title: Gurugram Woman Arrested For Filing False Rape Case To Extort Money
content: Gurugram police have arrested a woman for allegedly filing a false rape case as part of a criminal conspiracy to pressure and extort money from the husband of another complainant, police said on Wednesday.

title: No Fuel Without Pollution Certificate, No Entry For Old Cars In Delhi From Today
content: Vehicles that do not have BS-VI engines will not be allowed to enter the national capital from today as part of rigorous anti-pollution measures adopted by the Delhi government. Fuel stations will not serve vehicles without a PUC certificate.

title: Jammu Man Climbs Phone Tower After Exclusion From Shop Allotment Process
content: A man climbed a telecom tower on Wednesday to protest against the relief department after he was not allotted a shop under the Jagti Kashmiri Pandit migrant mini township on the outskirts of the city, officials said.

title: FBI Deputy Director Quits, Has A Message For Trump
content: Deputy FBI director Dan Bongino, a former right-wing podcaster, announced on Wednesday that he would step down in January after less than 10 months on the job.

title: "We Inherited A Mess": Trump To Set Out Plans To Make US "Stronger"
content: President Donald Trump will set out plans to make the United States "stronger than ever" in a televised address to the nation Wednesday as his popularity dips over his handling of the economy.

title: Parliament Passes Bill Allowing 100% FDI In Insurance Sector
content: Parliament on Wednesday passed the 'Sabka Bima Sabki Raksha (Amendment of Insurance Laws) Bill, 2025', with Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman assuring that opening up sector will attract new insurers, intermediaries and allied service providers.

title: Minor Girls Allegedly Drugged And Raped In Mumbai, Accused Arrested: Cops
content: A 45-year-old man has been arrested for allegedly raping multiple girls in Mumbai after mixing sedative pills in their soft drinks and later making their obscene videos, a police official said on Wednesday.

title: "There's A Deal To Be Had": Fareed Zakaria To NDTV On Trump, India-US Trade
content: A trade deal with the US is possible provided India handles it a certain way, since President Donald Trump, though transactional, also wants to announce a deal, Indian-origin US journalist Fareed Zakaria told NDTV in an exclusive interview today.

title: Zelensky Pleads for Aid as Ukraine Claims Russia Preparing for Extended War
content: Ukraine President Volodymyr Zelensky said that they received signals that Russia was preparing for a war in the next year.

title: US Congress Ends Syria Sanctions
content: The US Congress on Wednesday permanently ended sanctions imposed on Syria under ousted leader Bashar al-Assad, paving the way for the return of investment to the war-ravaged nation.

title: Navy Commissions Helicopter Squadron INAS 335 'Ospreys' In Goa
content: The Indian Navy on Wednesday commissioned its second squadron of MH-60R (Romeo) anti-submarine helicopters - INAS 335 'Ospreys' - at INS Hansa naval base in the presence of Chief of Naval Staff Admiral Dinesh Tripathi.

title: Debate On G RAM G Bill Concluded, Minister Shivraj Chouhan To Respond Today
content: The Lok Sabha, in the wee hours of Thursday, completed the discussion on the new rural jobs bill that seeks to replace the 20-year-old MGNREG Act.

title: Elon Musk Ally Jared Isaacman Appointed As NASA Chief
content: The US Senate on Wednesday confirmed billionaire private astronaut Jared Isaacman to become President Donald Trump's NASA administrator, making an advocate of Mars missions and a former associate of Elon Musk the space agency's 15th leader.

title: MLFF system by end-2026: Gadkari announces barrier-free highway tolls, camera-based collection
content: govt rolls out multi-lane free flow (MLFF) system, road transport and highways minister says . over 40 lakh private car owners have subscribed to the annual pass . the system allows private vehicles to cross 200 plazas .

title: Anti-India slogans, march on High Commission: India summons B'desh envoy over Dhaka security fears
content: india summoned high commissioner Riaz Hamidullah to express strong concerns at the deteriorating security environment in Bangladesh . in a statement, MEA said its attention was drawn, in particular, to activities of some extremist elements who have announced plans to create a security situation around the Indian mission in Dhaka . hundreds of protesters began a march towards the Indian High Commission on Wednesday afternoon raising anti-India slogans .

title: Delhi pollution: Govt orders 50% WFH in city govt, pvt offices from today
content: Alok K N Mishra is a New Delhi–based journalist with The Times of India. He has a deep interest in politics and in exploring how governance can be made to work better for the middle class and the poor. He also enjoys analyzing and predicting national political trends. Read More

title: Meet Cesar Barraza: Cop who killed Bondi Beach shooter from 40 metres with just a handgun
content: At TOI World Desk, our dedicated team of seasoned journalists and passionate writers tirelessly sifts through the vast tapestry of global events to bring you the latest news and diverse perspectives round the clock. title: National Mental Health Survey: Govt to assess scale of issue after 9-year gap; first since Covid
content: Anuja Jaiswal is a Senior Assistant Editor at The Times of India, with an impressive 18-year career in narrative journalism. She specializes in health and heritage reporting, expertly simplifying complex health information to make it engaging and understandable for readers. Her deep dives into heritage topics are well-researched, resulting in captivating narratives that resonate with her audience. Over the years, she has worked in Chandigarh, Chhattisgarh and West UP, gaining diverse on-ground experience that shapes her storytelling. Read More

title: Panel questions IndiGo, DGCA babus, gets 'unconvincing' replies
content: a parliamentary committee quizzed IndiGo over the misery inflicted on passengers by its mass-cancellation of flights . the committee blamed a variety of factors, including system glitch and adverse weather conditions . DGCA and the aviation ministry parried off criticism of their role in the fiasco .

title: CAG flags gaps in DBT: Thousands of crores flowing without checks; seeks stronger safeguards
content: Determine the monthly installment amount for a loan Estimate the returns on investments made through SIPs Find out maturity amount and interest earned on PPF Check maturity amount and interest earned on an FD Estimate the pension amount and corpus accumulated under NPS A Mutual Fund Calculator helps estimate the future value of investments

title: Why Flagg is in LeBron and Kobe territory, Carrington a sneaky pickup
content: Nikola Jokic posted 39 points, 15 rebounds and 10 assists in overtime win against Houston . alperen Sengun matched the moment with a 33-point triple-double . Cade Cunningham becomes the youngest player to score at least 40 in a game .

title: Nitish’s act sets off hijab row in J&K; Omar, PDP trade fire
content: CM Omar Abdullah has accused former CM Mehbooba Mufti of committing similar 'unsecular act' by removing the face veil of a legitimate voter in a polling station years ago . the CM's act is a continuation of that, he said .

title: Survivor pool strategy: Bills, Texans among top options in Week 16

content: Vishwa Mohan is Senior Editor at The Times of India. He writes on environment, climate change, agriculture, water resources and clean energy, tracking policy issues and climate diplomacy. title: 150 prospects, 12 schools, 7 rounds: We stacked players in the CFP by NFL draft stock

title: Ward wants Titans to involve him in HC search
content: quarterback says he'll be all-in on the next head coach regardless of whether it's a defensive- or offensive-minded hire . Tennessee fired coach Brian Callahan in October after a 1-5 start to the season .
